description.value:
[Addictive] Lasts ~3 Hours, heightens all sensory inputs to extreme degrees. User gains Dark Sight Trait and +20 to all Perception based Tests. However if user ever passes a Test by 5+ Degrees of Success, they must immediately make a +0 Willpower Test or become stunned for 1d5 rounds from sensation overload.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
